title: Operational Security for Long-Term Engagements
subtitle: Infrastructure hygiene, comms discipline, and logging
prerequisites: Lateral Movement Operations & Command and Control
learning_objectives: Design OPSEC plans covering infrastructure, operations, and reporting
Maintain clean C2 infrastructure across long engagements
Implement communication discipline with white cell coordination
Monitor for blue-team detection without tipping off
Manage artefacts, logs, and credentials responsibly
Capture OPSEC lessons learned and improve SOPs

content_blocks.title: OPSEC LOOP

content.text:
### OPSEC LOOP
- **O**rg plan
- **P**rotect infrastructure
- **S**ignal monitoring
- **E**nsure communication discipline
- **C**ontain artefacts
- **L**og lessons
- **O**ptimise safeties
- **O**versee credentials
- **P**urge on exit

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Condense the lesson into an easy-to-recall mnemonic.
content_blocks.real_world_connection: Analysts lean on mnemonics to brief stakeholders quickly.
content_blocks.reflection_prompt: How will you share this mnemonic with your team?

content_blocks.title: Guided Simulation

content.text:
1. Draft an OPSEC checklist for a 90-day engagement.
2. Define infrastructure rotation schedules and kill switches.
3. Outline comms cadence with white cell and internal team.
4. Plan artefact cleanup and evidence retention.
